channel.description: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from bbcnews

item.title: Could American Eagle get sued for the Sydney Sweeney ad? We spoke to a crisis PR manager and a criminal defence attorney to find out more. American Eagle have since said in a statement on Instagram that the campaign "is and always was about the jeans." #S
